name: Mike the Cave-Man
overview: Odd little platformer made in BASIC released by Klaus-Dieter Frohn and published in both 64'er Sonderheft 66, and in 64'er 1999/01. Mike the Caveman: An archaeologist is desperately looking for the exit from the old pyramid before he runs out of air. Find the right path away and save Mike! The archaeologist Dr. Mike Holehead has himself trapped in the catacombs of the Chenon Pyramid. Help him get back to daylight!
